数学家探索大脑折叠如何有助于改善脑力数学家正在调查人脑中复杂的褶皱如何（随着我们物种的发展而增加）有助于提高我们的脑力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/mathematicians-explore-how-brain-folding-helps-helps-improve-brainpower.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/mathematicians-explore-how-brain-folding-helps-helps-improve-brainpower.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27afa2b2b2-988f-440e-a7fb-9bff6e94Adc9 Fri, 21 Feb 2025 01:11:00 -0500 Mathematicians explore how brain folding helps improve brainpower
研究表明体育锻炼对年轻人的福祉的积极影响PE，学校运动和体育活动（PESSPA）是培养曼彻斯特大学专家与青年运动信托基金会合作的一项新研究，是培养更健康，更快乐，更富有弹性的儿童和年轻人的关键工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/research-shows-hows-the-posisity-impact--physical-physical-activity-activity-an-young-peoplee28099s-well-being.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/research-shows-the-posive-posive-posive-physical-physical-achysical-activity-ach------------------------------------------------------------- being.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4220A57F-251A-4520-A366-47E0DF27F55F Fri, 21 Feb 2025 01:07:00 -0500 Research shows the positive impact of physical activity on young people’s well-being

了解减肥药对女性生殖健康的影响近几个月来，避孕人员对服用减肥药的疗效受到了质疑，因为一些妇女声称尽管使用了口服避孕药，但仍声称怀孕了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/understanding-the-the--impact-of-weight-weight-weight-loss-medications-on-female-female-preproductive-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/understanding-the-the--impact------------------------------------------ on-female-female-reproductive-health-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd2EA38D-3058-472C-A34F-7A40D0547AC2 Fri, 21 Feb 2025 00:54:00 -0500 Understanding the impact of weight loss medications on female reproductive health

具有可定制辅助技术的未来防痴呆护理新泽西理工学院信息学助理教授艾丽莎·普拉丹（Alisha Pradhan）的新研究称，如果辅助技术能够与他们的进步状况同时发展，那么轻度痴呆的人可能会更加独立地生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/future-proofing-dementia-care-with-care-with-customizable-sassistive-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/future-proofing-dementia-care-with-care-with-castomizable-sassistive-sassistive-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=579E7E8C-23E0-45CD-9088-60560BDC7C23 Thu, 20 Feb 2025 23:34:00 -0500 Future-proofing dementia care with customizable assistive technology
新的3D肺模型进步呼吸医学研究呼吸道疾病是一个具有挑战性的问题。可吸入药物是一种有前途的解决方案，取决于在正确剂量下将称为气溶胶的小颗粒传递到肺部正确位置的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/new-3d-lung-model-advances-respiratory-medicine-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/new-3d-lung-model-advances-respiratory-medicine-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c52e32d5-d24f-4f-4f52-bfee-63021f64f168 Thu, 20 Feb 2025 23:22:46 -0500 New 3D lung model advances respiratory medicine research

自恋者觉得更频繁地被排除在外，但是他们在误读房间吗？自恋者更有可能感到被排斥 - 不仅仅是因为他们的个性，还因为他们对排除线索的敏感性提高。研究发现，社会排斥和自恋在自我延续的周期中相互加强。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/narcissists-feel-left-more-more-otene28094but-are-are-misreading-the-room.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/narcissists-feel-left--feel-left-more-ore-oftene28094but-are-are-misreading-misreading-the-room.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a9497d4-b3E7-45D4-9627-7EB108068B1B Thu, 20 Feb 2025 22:33:00 -0500 Narcissists feel left out more often—but are they misreading the room?
